element.name: Facility City
element.definition: The city where the facility is located.
element.v3Comment:
Based on GNIS Civil Code or Populated Place code. The information contained within this element could be used to populate the address information within eScene.17 (Incident City) and/or eDisposition.04 (Destination City) as appropriate.
GNIS Codes Website: http://geonames.usgs.gov/domestic/download_data.htm
